query:
SELECT
                    ip,
                    port,
                    user_agent,
                    MIN(first_seen_at) as "first_seen_at!",
                    MAX(last_seen_at) as "last_seen_at!",
                    SUM(real_uploaded)::BIGINT as "real_uploaded!",
                    SUM(real_downloaded)::BIGINT as "real_downloaded!"
                FROM peers
                WHERE user_id = $1
                GROUP BY (peer_id, ip, port, user_agent)
